name: Amazon CloudEndure Disaster Recovery
short: A service on AWS that provides rapid, reliable recovery of physical, virtual, and cloud-based servers into AWS in the event of IT disruptions.
description: AWS CloudEndure Disaster Recovery is a service that provides fast and reliable recovery of physical, virtual, and cloud-based servers into AWS. It continuously replicates your machines (including system state, OS, applications, databases, settings) to a low-cost staging area in your AWS account. In case of a disaster, you can quickly launch thousands of machines simultaneously. It minimizes downtime and data loss, ensuring your business continuity and reducing overall disaster recovery costs.
